name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Tri Force Heroes Update
formal_name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Tri Force Heroes Update Ver. 2.1.0
description:
This is an update for the The Legend of Zelda™: Tri Force Heroes game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of The Legend of Zelda™: Tri Force Heroes.

Update details: A new “Hero Points” feature has been added to enhance the game. Collect enough hero points and you can trade them for materials you need or even power up a certain outfit.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
